Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Allows for a modest increase in annual income to not disqualify someone from the excelsior scholarship
Summary: Allows for a modest increase in annual income, not greater than three percent per year, to not disqualify someone from the excelsior scholarship.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to allowing for a modest increase in annual income to not disqualify someone from the excelsior scholarship
